Description.Text:
Position Ausonia Hotel faces on Adriatic sea, along the 9 km long sandy promenade.
Restaurant Air conditioned Restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2007. Breakfast with sweet and salty buffet. Restaurant with 3 choises menu, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert. Credit cards accepted: Eurocard/Mastercard and Visa. Swimming pool by Adria Hotel (next to Ausonia Hotels) opened from dal 01/06/2013 to 07/09/2013 from h.9:00 to h.19:00 with animation from 08/06 al 01/09/2013 (2 hours in the morning, 2 hours in the afternoon and 2 hours in the evening). All inclusive prices include, in HB and FB treatments, the unlimited drinks (water, wine and orange juice) + beach service with 1 beach umbrella and 2 sunbeds per rooms from the 4th row (single rooms with 1 beach umbrella and 1 sunbed) + the utilization of swimming pool by Adria Hotel (same management) next to Ausonia Hotel (there is only a pathway to cross). CHECK IN: from 12.00 (midday). CHECK OUT: until 10.am.
